name: Inn Story
description:
Originally released within the Friendly Distance Bundle, Inn Story is a simple role-playing experience about the secret world of fantasy inn creatures. Roll up a random combination of trait and creature type and have a go.

Maybe you're a luck hound that brings good fortune to the travelers that stop in... or maybe you're a mirror spider that crawls between the inn and the mirror-verse... or maybe you're just a simple song rat that offers a beautiful yet humble chirping to the background noise at the bar...

You're small and the humans don't think much of you... but your limits are set by your creativity and ingenuity...
